title: Let it go Let it go

replies.msg:
Let it go Let it go
Can't strong hold anymore
Let it go, let it go
Turn away and slam the door
I don't care what they're going to say
Let the bear rage on
The drop never bothered me anyway

It's funny how market dropping makes every stock seem small
And the money that once controlled me can't let me catch at all
It's time to see what I can sell
To test the bear trap and break through
No raise, no drop, no rules for me
I'm poor!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Do you want to long an option
